remarks: The edge function of an undirected simple graph with loops is a one-to-one function into unordered pairs of vertices.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 10-Aug-2017.)
statement:
uslgraf $p |- ( V USLGrph E -> E : dom E -1-1-> { x e. ( ~P V \ { (/) } ) | ( # ` x ) <_ 2 } ) $.
$d E x $.
$d V x $.
